item.description:
This is one of Boston's best kept secrets.

Is that all I should say? Hrm. Would it entice you to come or turn you off?

Well, just in case of the latter, let's just say that The Sevens Ale House carries its very own Sevens Ale, brewed by none other than Harpoon. Oh, and did I mention it's on draft for $5 a pint? (It's personally one of my favorite dark ales.)

If that's not enough, they have a pretty decent tap selection, as well a diverse by-the-bottle list.

Even still, the ambiance is pretty cool. I hear their chili is, too. And it's a hot spot for locals who are in the know, like to gather for a game of darts or prefer to watch the Sox games perched on a stool.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Mid-Week Drinks: Beacon Hill
